item.title: Contact

item.title: Sequential Bayesian estimation and model selection
item.description: Work done in collaboration with Tony Pettitt from QUT Brisbane. I would like to: Introduce the Dirichlet form, which can be thought of as a generalisation of expected squared jumping distance, and show that the spectral gap has a variational representation over Dirichlet forms. Introduce the asymptotic variance of a Markov chain, which is the theoretical equivalent of the practical measure of 1/effective sample size, and provide a variational representation of this.
